casebody.data:
CARL J. GRECO, P.C. a/k/a Greco Law Associates, P.C., Petitioner
v.
DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, OFFICE OF UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION TAX SERVICES, Respondent No. 82 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 12, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 12th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
